tr.td: W&J wins toss; will receive. THI will kick left to right.
Cody Dinger kickoff 51 yards to the WJC14, Luke Merhaut return 20 yards to the WJC34 (Grant Syster).
Ryan Ruffing rush for 5 yards to the WJC39 (Tyron Bynum).
Pete Coughlin pass complete to Jesse Zubik for 4 yards to the WJC43, out-of-bounds.
Ryan Ruffing rush for 4 yards to the WJC47 (Jeremy Steffine).
Pete Coughlin pass complete to Asa Costelnock for 20 yards to the THI33 (Trevor Martin).
Ryan Ruffing rush for 8 yards to the THI25 (Doak Walker Jr.).
Pete Coughlin pass complete to Daniel Lis for 25 yards to the THI00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 13:25.

Ryan Radke rush for 12 yards to the THI38 (Ryan Torrance; Tom Marra).
Ryan Radke pass incomplete to Cody Dinger.
Ryan Radke pass complete to Ron Howard for 8 yards to the THI46 (Luke Merhaut).
Ryan Radke pass incomplete to Ron Howard.
